item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: constructionste
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: constructionste
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: constructionste
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/wordpress.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

align-items: center;\r\n z-index: 1000;\r\n }\r\n .modal-content {\r\n background-color: #fff;\r\n padding: 25px;\r\n border-radius: 10px;\r\n width: 600px;\r\n max-height: 85%;\r\n overflow-y: #333;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body input,\r\n .modal-body textarea {\r\n padding: 12px;\r\n font-size: 14px;\r\n border: 1px solid #ddd;\r\n border-radius: 5px;\r\n resize: none;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body input:focus,\r\n .modal-body textarea:focus {\r\n border-color: #FFCC00;\r\n outline: none;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body input[required] {\r\n border-left: 4px solid #FFCC00;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body input[type=\"file\"] {\r\n display: none;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body .file-label {\r\n display: inline-block;\r\n padding: 12px 24px;\r\n background-color: #FFCC00;\r\n color: #333;\r\n border-radius: 5px;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n cursor: pointer;\r\n text-align: center;\r\n transition: background-color 0.3s ease;\r\n }\r\n .modal-body .file-label:hover {\r\n background-color: #e6b800;\r\n }\r\n .file-name {\r\n margin-top: 5px;\r\n font-size: 14px;\r\n color: #555;\r\n }\r\n .modal-footer {\r\n display: flex;\r\n justify-content: space-between;\r\n align-items: center;\r\n margin-top: 15px;\r\n }\r\n .modal-footer button {\r\n width: 48%;\r\n }\r\n .btn-annuler {\r\n background-color: #FF9900 !important;\r\n color: #fff;\r\n }\r\n .btn-annuler:hover {\r\n background-color: #CC7A00 !important;\r\n }\r\n .submit-modal {\r\n background-color: #FFCC00;\r\n color: #333;\r\n }\r\n .submit-modal:hover {\r\n background-color: #e6b800;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Toast Styles *\/\r\n .toast {\r\n position: fixed;\r\n bottom: 20px;\r\n right: 20px;\r\n background-color: #FFCC00;\r\n color: #333;\r\n padding: 15px 20px;\r\n border-radius: 5px;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\r\n opacity: 0;\r\n transform: translateY(50px);\r\n transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease;\r\n z-index: 2000;\r\n }\r\n .toast.show {\r\n opacity: 1;\r\n transform: translateY(0);\r\n }\r\n <\/style>\r\n<\/head>\r\n<body>\r\n <!-- Button to Open Modal -->\r\n <div style=\"text-align: center; margin: 10px;\">\r\n <button id=\"openModal\">Postuler \u00e0 un emploi<\/button>\r\n <\/div>\r\n\r\n <!-- Modal Structure -->\r\n <div class=\"modal\" id=\"rhModal\">\r\n <div class=\"modal-content\">\r\n <div class=\"modal-header\">Espace RH - Recrutement<\/div>\r\n <div class=\"modal-body\">\r\n <label for=\"name\">Nom complet (Requis) :<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"text\" id=\"name\" placeholder=\"Votre nom complet\" required>\r\n\r\n <label for=\"email\">Email (Requis) :<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"email\" id=\"email\" placeholder=\"Votre adresse email\" required>\r\n\r\n <label for=\"subject\">Sujet :<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"text\" id=\"subject\" placeholder=\"Sujet du message\">\r\n\r\n <label for=\"message\">Message :<\/label>\r\n <textarea id=\"message\" rows=\"5\" placeholder=\"Votre message\"><\/textarea>\r\n\r\n <label for=\"cv\" class=\"file-label\">T\u00e9l\u00e9charger votre CV (Requis)<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"file\" id=\"cv\" accept=\".pdf,.doc,.docx\" required>\r\n <span class=\"file-name\" id=\"fileName\">Aucun fichier choisi<\/span>\r\n <\/div>\r\n <div class=\"modal-footer\">\r\n <button class=\"btn-annuler\" id=\"closeModal\">Annuler<\/button>\r\n <button class=\"submit-modal\" id=\"submitForm\">Soumettre<\/button>\r\n <\/div>\r\n <\/div>\r\n <\/div>\r\n\r\n <!-- Toast Notification -->\r\n <div class=\"toast\" id=\"toast\">Formulaire soumis avec succ\u00e8s !<\/div>\r\n\r\n <script>\r\n \/\/ Modal Logic\r\n const openModalButton = document.getElementById(\"openModal\");\r\n const closeModalButton = document.getElementById(\"closeModal\");\r\n const modal = document.getElementById(\"rhModal\");\r\n const toast = document.getElementById(\"toast\");\r\n const fileInput = document.getElementById(\"cv\");\r\n const fileNameSpan = document.getElementById(\"fileName\");\r\n\r\n \/\/ Open Modal\r\n openModalButton.addEventListener(\"click\", () => {\r\n modal.style.display = \"flex\";\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Close Modal\r\n closeModalButton.addEventListener(\"click\", () => {\r\n modal.style.display = \"none\";\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Display File Name\r\n fileInput.addEventListener(\"change\", () => {\r\n const fileName = fileInput.files[0]?.name || \"Aucun fichier choisi\";\r\n fileNameSpan.textContent = fileName;\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Submit Form\r\n document.getElementById(\"submitForm\").addEventListener(\"click\", () => {\r\n const name = document.getElementById(\"name\").value.trim();\r\n const email = document.getElementById(\"email\").value.trim();\r\n const cv = fileInput.files[0];\r\n\r\n if (!name || !email || !cv) {\r\n showToast(\"Veuillez remplir tous les champs requis et t\u00e9l\u00e9charger votre CV.\", true);\r\n return;\r\n }\r\n\r\n showToast(\"Formulaire soumis avec succ\u00e8s !\", false);\r\n modal.style.display = \"none\";\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Close modal when clicking outside of it\r\n window.addEventListener(\"click\", (event) => {\r\n if (event.target === modal) {\r\n modal.style.display = \"none\";\r\n }\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Toast Logic\r\n function showToast(message, isError) {\r\n toast.textContent = message;\r\n toast.style.backgroundColor = isError ? \"#e74c3c\" : \"#FFCC00\";\r\n toast.style.color = isError ? \"#fff\" : \"#333\";\r\n toast.classList.add(\"show\");\r\n setTimeout(() => {\r\n toast.classList.remove(\"show\");\r\n }, 3000);\r\n }\r\n html>\r\n<html lang=\"fr\">\r\n<head>\r\n <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\r\n <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">\r\n <title>Contactez-nous<\/title>\r\n <style>\r\n \/* Styles g\u00e9n\u00e9raux *\/\r\n body {\r\n font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;\r\n margin: 0;\r\n padding: 0;\r\n background-color: #f4f4f4;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Bouton pour ouvrir le modal *\/\r\n .contact-button {\r\n display: inline-block;\r\n padding: 15px 30px;\r\n font-size: 18px;\r\n background-color: #FF9900;\r\n color: white;\r\n border: none;\r\n border-radius: 8px;\r\n cursor: pointer;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n margin: 30px;\r\n transition: background-color 0.3s ease;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .contact-button:hover {\r\n background-color: #CC7A00;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Overlay du modal *\/\r\n .modal-overlay {\r\n display: none;\r\n position: fixed;\r\n top: 0;\r\n left: 0;\r\n width: 100%;\r\n height: 100%;\r\n background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);\r\n z-index: 1000;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Contenu du modal *\/\r\n .modal-content {\r\n position: fixed;\r\n top: 50%;\r\n left: 50%;\r\n transform: translate(-50%, -50%);\r\n background-color: white;\r\n padding: 40px;\r\n width: 600px;\r\n height: 700px;\r\n max-width: 90%;\r\n border-radius: 12px;\r\n box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);\r\n z-index: 1001;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content h2 {\r\n font-size: 28px;\r\n color: #333;\r\n margin-bottom: 25px;\r\n text-align: center;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Champs d'entr\u00e9e stylis\u00e9s *\/\r\n .modal-content label {\r\n font-size: 16px;\r\n color: #555;\r\n margin-bottom: 8px;\r\n display: block;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content input, .modal-content textarea {\r\n padding: 12px;\r\n font-size: 15px;\r\n margin-bottom: 20px;\r\n border: 2px solid #ddd;\r\n border-radius: 8px;\r\n width: 100%;\r\n box-sizing: border-box;\r\n transition: border-color 0.3s ease;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content input:focus, .modal-content textarea:focus {\r\n border-color: #FF9900;\r\n outline: none;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content textarea {\r\n resize: vertical;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content button {\r\n padding: 15px;\r\n font-size: 18px;\r\n background-color: #FF9900;\r\n color: white;\r\n border: none;\r\n border-radius: 8px;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n cursor: pointer;\r\n transition: background-color 0.3s ease;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .modal-content button:hover {\r\n background-color: #CC7A00;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Bouton de fermeture stylis\u00e9 *\/\r\n .close-modal {\r\n position: absolute;\r\n top: 20px;\r\n right: 20px;\r\n background-color: #FF9900;\r\n color: white;\r\n border: none;\r\n border-radius: 50%;\r\n width: 40px;\r\n height: 40px;\r\n font-size: 20px;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n cursor: pointer;\r\n display: flex;\r\n align-items: center;\r\n justify-content: center;\r\n transition: background-color 0.3s ease;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .close-modal:hover {\r\n background-color: #CC7A00;\r\n }\r\n\r\n \/* Toast de succ\u00e8s *\/\r\n .toast {\r\n display: none;\r\n position: fixed;\r\n bottom: 20px;\r\n right: 20px;\r\n background-color: #4CAF50;\r\n color: white;\r\n padding: 15px 30px;\r\n border-radius: 8px;\r\n box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\r\n z-index: 2000;\r\n font-size: 16px;\r\n font-weight: bold;\r\n }\r\n\r\n .toast.show {\r\n display: block;\r\n animation: fadein 0.5s, fadeout 0.5s 2.5s;\r\n }\r\n\r\n @keyframes fadein {\r\n from {opacity: 0;}\r\n to {opacity: 1;}\r\n }\r\n\r\n @keyframes fadeout {\r\n from {opacity: 1;}\r\n to {opacity: 0;}\r\n }\r\n <\/style>\r\n<\/head>\r\n<body>\r\n\r\n <!-- Bouton pour ouvrir le modal -->\r\n <button class=\"contact-button\" id=\"openContactModal\">Contactez-nous<\/button>\r\n\r\n <!-- Overlay du modal -->\r\n <div class=\"modal-overlay\" id=\"contactModalOverlay\">\r\n <div class=\"modal-content\">\r\n <button class=\"close-modal\" id=\"closeContactModal\">×<\/button>\r\n <h2>Contactez-nous<\/h2>\r\n <form id=\"contactForm\">\r\n <label for=\"name\">Nom <span style=\"color: red;\">*<\/span><\/label>\r\n <input type=\"text\" id=\"name\" name=\"name\" required placeholder=\"Entrez votre nom\">\r\n\r\n <label for=\"email\">E-mail <span style=\"color: red;\">*<\/span><\/label>\r\n <input type=\"email\" id=\"email\" name=\"email\" required placeholder=\"Entrez votre e-mail\">\r\n\r\n <label for=\"phone\">T\u00e9l\u00e9phone<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"tel\" id=\"phone\" name=\"phone\" placeholder=\"Entrez votre num\u00e9ro de t\u00e9l\u00e9phone\">\r\n\r\n <label for=\"subject\">Sujet<\/label>\r\n <input type=\"text\" id=\"subject\" name=\"subject\" placeholder=\"Entrez le sujet\">\r\n\r\n <label for=\"message\">Message<\/label>\r\n <textarea id=\"message\" name=\"message\" rows=\"5\" placeholder=\"\u00c9crivez votre message ici\"><\/textarea>\r\n\r\n <button type=\"submit\">Envoyer<\/button>\r\n <\/form>\r\n <\/div>\r\n <\/div>\r\n\r\n <!-- Toast -->\r\n <div class=\"toast\" id=\"successToast\">Message envoy\u00e9 avec succ\u00e8s !<\/div>\r\n\r\n <script>\r\n \/\/ Gestion de l'ouverture et fermeture du modal\r\n const openModal = document.getElementById('openContactModal');\r\n const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeContactModal');\r\n const modalOverlay = document.getElementById('contactModalOverlay');\r\n\r\n openModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\r\n modalOverlay.style.display = 'block';\r\n });\r\n\r\n closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\r\n modalOverlay.style.display = 'none';\r\n });\r\n\r\n window.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\r\n if (e.target === modalOverlay) {\r\n modalOverlay.style.display = 'none';\r\n }\r\n });\r\n\r\n \/\/ Afficher le toast lors de la soumission\r\n const contactForm = document.getElementById('contactForm');\r\n const successToast = document.getElementById('successToast');\r\n\r\n contactForm.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {\r\n e.preventDefault(); \/\/ Emp\u00eache l'envoi r\u00e9el\r\n successToast.classList.add('show');\r\n setTimeout(() => successToast.classList.remove('show'), 3000); \/\/ Cache le toast apr\u00e8s 3 secondes\r\n modalOverlay.style.display = 'none'; \/\/ Ferme le modal\r\n });\r\n <\/script>\r\n<\/body>\r\n<\/html>\r\n"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wp-widget-custom_html"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"2ec38df","elType":"container","settings":{"_column_size":66,"width":{"size":66.67,"unit":"%"},"width_tablet":{"size":100,"unit":"%"},"padding_tablet":{"unit":"px","top":"30","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"content_width":"full","flex_gap":{"column":"0","row":"0","isLinked":false,"unit":"px","size":0},"margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[{"id":"e71c017","elType":"widget","settings":{"address":"L'universit\u00e9 Un message à nos collaborateurs et partenaires

Mot de Directeur

Dans le Contexte des Transformations du Maroc

Dans le cadre des grandes transformations que connaît notre pays, l’Université Privée de Fès (UPF) s’engage dans un projet académique ambitieux visant à accompagner la réussite des programmes structurants du Maroc, tout en tenant compte de leurs déclinaisons régionales.

Pour contribuer à cet objectif, le projet Sté Rahiane & BELHAJ BTP s’inscrit dans cette dynamique en mettant en œuvre les ambitions de l’UPF. Ce projet est aligné avec la stratégie globale de développement du secteur BTP (Bâtiment et Travaux Publics) au Maroc, en offrant des solutions innovantes et adaptées aux enjeux actuels.

Dirigeants :

  • Mr. RAHIANE – Président Directeur Général (PDG)
  • Mr. BELHAJ – Directeur Exécutif (DE)
Nos Services
Contactez-nous

Construisez votre rêve

Services de Qualité

Voir tout

Exploitation des terres

Aménagement durable et efficace,
valorisez pleinement votre terrain.

Personnel de bâtiment

Experts qualifiés et dévoués,
garantissant des travaux impeccables.

Approvisionnement en matériel

Matériaux de qualité livrés
pour des constructions durables.

Consultance

Conseils d'experts pour
des projets réussis.

Architecture

Conceptions innovantes pour
des espaces uniques et durables.

Service de grue

Levage sécurisé et précis
pour vos projets de construction.

Durabilité

Engagé à maintenir les gens en bonne santé et en sécurité

Nous priorisons le bien-être de nos employés et partenaires, en mettant en place des protocoles stricts de sécurité et des pratiques de santé rigoureuses sur tous nos chantiers.

Entrer en contact

Nous suivons les meilleures pratiques

Nous nous engageons à respecter les normes les plus élevées de l’industrie, garantissant ainsi des résultats de qualité, une sécurité optimale et une satisfaction client inégalée à chaque étape de nos projets.

  • Durabilité
  • Projet à temps
  • Technologie moderne
  • Derniers Designs
